cont.entity_a: Coating is coming off after 8 months of use. Non-stick finish comes off if not cared for properly. Non-stick coating wears off after a short time.
Heats evenly and cleans easily. Heats unevenly, burns food in spots. Quick heating and even temperature distribution. Not suitable for deep frying as it lacks power to heat oil adequately.
cont.entity_b: Heat distribution is uneven. Heats up quickly and cooks evenly.

cont.entity_a: Glass lid exploded during first wash. Heavy glass top seals correctly. Lid makes popping sounds due to heating element expansion.
cont.entity_b: Lid stains easily. Lid does not have a vent.
Temperature control is accurate. Temperature dial is small and difficult to set.

cont.entity_a: Perfect size for a family of 3. Large size allows cooking for a family of 7.
Handles need to be tightened frequently. Handles are wobbly and stick out.
cont.entity_b: Handles break off easily. Plastic handles have a plasticy smell.
Great for cooking large batches. Works well for frying and slow cooking. Not deep enough for cooking large quantities of sauce.
